meanings.definition: A point or level beyond which something does not or may not extend or pass.
meanings.sent1: The speed limit on this road is 55 miles per hour.
meanings.sent2: She reached her limit of patience after waiting for hours.
meanings.sent3: The limit of the number of cookies you can eat is three.
meanings.sent4: His kindness knows no limit, always helping others.
meanings.sent5: The limit of the ocean seemed endless, stretching to the horizon.

meanings.definition: The furthest extent of one's ability or resources.
meanings.sent1: Her physical limit was reached after running a marathon.
meanings.sent2: He pushed himself to the limit to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The limit of her singing talent surprised everyone at the talent show.
meanings.sent4: His creativity knew no limit, always coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The limit of his knowledge about space was vast, impressing his classmates.

meanings.sent1: There is a time limit for completing the exam.
meanings.sent2: The budget limit for the party was set at $100.
meanings.sent3: The limit of the playground is where the fence ends.
meanings.sent4: His curiosity had no limit, always exploring new places.
meanings.sent5: The limit of her understanding of the topic was evident in her questions.
